data.title: Exor Electronic Distributor - HMI & HMI with Control Solutions
data.meta_description: Servo2Go proudly carries Exor Electronic HMI and HMI with Control Solutions which are designed to enhance the user experience. Browse our selection!
data.text:
Exor specializes in providing robust and intuitive interfaces for industrial automation applications, and all these products can be conveniently purchased directly through our online platform. Key products from Exor Electronic R&D include their eTOP Series 500 and JMobile Software. These products are designed to deliver superior performance, reliability, and user-friendliness.

Main features and products are:

eTOP Series 500 HMI Products: This series includes a variety of HMIs with different display sizes, resolutions, and touchscreen types. Their design is optimized for excellent readability and ease of use in industrial environments.

JMobile Software: An innovative software solution that allows for the development of sophisticated HMI applications. It provides a range of functions, including data acquisition, visualization, and remote control.

Servo2go is committed to offering a seamless online shopping experience for your motion control needs. We provide comprehensive information about each product to ensure you can make the right decision for your specific application. Trust in Servo2go and Exor Electronic R&D for reliable, intuitive HMI solutions.
